message.entry: Row and column must be positive integers less than 32768.
Tile must be a positive integer.
Tile span values must be positive integers.
The layout does not have sufficient space.
The tile does not fit in the layout.
Insufficient memory to create a tile in the current layout.
Object must be a child of a TiledChartLayout.
All objects must be children of the same TiledChartLayout.
Row and column indices are only supported in ''fixed'' tile arrangements.
